alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene; Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 03 at 6:35PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by prolonged rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio, including the following areas, Belmont, Monroe and Noble. Portions of southwest Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Fayette, Greene and Washington. Portions of West Virginia, including the following areas, Brooke, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker, Marion, Marshall, Monongalia, Ohio, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, Western Tucker and Wetzel. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Runoff from rain and snowmelt may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
